item.title: Drone Vision
item.author: ricardo.chin@tecnico.ulisboa.pt (Ricardo Chin)
item.description: Drone - System Dynamics & Controller # 1.1 RedBull Racing # The world of Red Bull drone racing stands at the intersection of high-speed competition and very advanced technology. In this exhilarating arena, unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) navigate intricate courses filled with obstacles, pushing the limits of flight capabilities and piloting skills. To revolutionize this dynamic sport, our project aims to integrate advanced AI, computer vision, and simulated dynamics to elevate drone performance and safety within the competitive realm.
